LV $sp, bstack is
LUI $at, bstack (bstack = 0xffffffff, so 0xffff)
1011 0000 0011 1010 1111 1111 1111 1111
LUI---ZERO--AT----xx(0xffff)-----------
10110000001110101111111111111111 = 0xb03affff

and 
ORI $sp, $at, bstack (bstack = 0xffffffff, so 0x1ffff)
0011 0111 0111 1001 1111 1111 1111 1111
ORI---AT----SP----(0x1ffff)------------
00110111011110011111111111111111 = 0x3779ffff

ADDI $t0, $zero, 1
0000 1000 0000 1010 0000 0000 0000 0001
ADDI--ZERO--T0----0x1------------------
00001000000010100000000000000001 = 0x080A0001

ADDI $t1, $zero, 2
0000 1000 0000 1100 0000 0000 0000 0010
ADDI--ZERO--T1----0x2------------------
00001000000011000000000000000010 = 0x080C0002

ADDI $t2, $zero, 3
0000 1000 0000 1110 0000 0000 0000 0011
ADDI--ZERO--T2----0x3------------------
00001000000011100000000000000011 = 0x080E0003

ADDI $t3, $zero, 4
0000 1000 0001 0000 0000 0000 0000 0100
ADDI--ZERO--T3----0x4------------------
00001000000100000000000000000100 = 0x08100004

SB $t0, $sp, 0
1010 0111 0000 1010 0000 0000 0000 0000
SB----SP----T0----(0x0)----------------
10100111000010100000000000000000 = 0xA70A0000

SB $t1, $sp, 1
1010 0111 0000 1100 0000 0000 0000 0001
SB----SP----T1----(0x1)----------------
10100111000011000000000000000001 = 0xA70C0001

SB $t2, $sp, 2
1010 0111 0000 1110 0000 0000 0000 0010
SB----SP----T2----(0x2)----------------
10100111000011100000000000000010 = 0xA70E0002

SB $t3, $sp, 3
1010 0111 0001 0000 0000 0000 0000 0011
SB----SP----T3----(0x3)----------------
10100111000100000000000000000011 = 0xA7100003

LB $t4, $sp, 0
1000 1111 0001 0010 0000 0000 0000 0000
LB----SP----T4----(0x0)----------------
10001111000100100000000000000000 = 0x8F120000

LB $t5, $sp, 1
1000 1111 0001 0100 0000 0000 0000 0001
LB----SP----T5----(0x1)----------------
10001111000101000000000000000001 = 0x8F140001

LB $t6, $sp, 2
1000 1111 0001 0110 0000 0000 0000 0010
LB----SP----T6----(0x2)----------------
10001111000101100000000000000010 = 0x8F160002

LB $t7, $sp, 3
1000 1111 0001 1000 0000 0000 0000 0011
LB----SP----T7----(0x3)----------------
10001111000110000000000000000011 = 0x8F180003

LW $s0, $sp, 0b0
1000 0111 0001 1010 0000 0000 0000 0000
LW----SP----S0----(0b0)----------------
10000111000110100000000000000000 = 0x871A0000

CPY $s0, $s1 is
ADD $s0, $s1, $zero
0000 0011 1000 0000 1101 0000 0000 0001
ALUI--S1----ZERO--S0-----7'b0----ADD---
00000011100000001101000000000001 = 0x0380D001

SURI $s0, $s0, 1
0101 0011 0101 1010 0000 0000 0000 0001
SURI--S0----S0----0x1------------------
01010011010110100000000000000001 = 0x535A0001

SUL $s0, $s0, $t0
0000 0011 0100 1010 1101 0000 0000 1000
ALUI--S0----T0----S0-----7'b0----SUL---
00000011010010101101000000001000 = 0x034AD008

EQ $s0, $s0, $s1
0000 0011 0100 1100 1101 0000 0001 0000
ALUI--S0----S1----S0-----7'b0----EQ----
00000011010011001101000000010000 = 0x034CD010
